name: mmdet_2020-03-01_retinanet_x101_32x4d_fpn_1x-predict
description: Making predictions using object detection models built with MMDetection 2020-03-01

inputs.name: model
inputs.help: The MMDetection object detection model to use for making predictions.

inputs.name: data
inputs.help: The dataset to generate predictions for.

parameters.name: store-predictions
parameters.help: If enabled, the predictions get stored back in the dataset that they were generated for.
